short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab page that shows you your downloads, and allows you to save notes about the files you download and save.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember why you downloaded files.  Save notes about why you thought the downloaded file was interesting.

‚ùì Are you tired of downloading files and forgetting why you even saved them?
‚ùì Do you often need help keeping track of your downloaded documents, images, and PDFs?

With Download Home, you can save notes related to your downloads so you never forget why you downloaded them.

‚úÖ When you download a file, a popup asks if you want to save a note.
‚úÖ You can review and edit them on the all-new Downloads page.
‚úÖ You'll see your downloads and notes when you open a new tab, so you're up-to-date.

We know how important it is to stay organized and productive, so we designed Download Home to help you use Chrome more efficiently. This extension is perfect for staying on top of your downloaded files.  It will help you streamline your workflow.

üîí Your download notes are stored locally, and your browser does not share information with us about your downloads. Your privacy is important to us.

üõü If you need help or have questions, our support team is always ready to assist you. Simply email us at help@vgenerator.com, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Download Home is the must-have extension for anyone who wants to stay organized and productive while downloading files. Try it out today and see the difference it can make in your workflow!
